cast.overview: The story of the miraculous evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, Britain, Canada and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbour of Dunkirk between May 26th and June 4th 1940 during World War II.
cast.title: Dunkirk

cast.overview: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.
cast.title: Darkest Hour

details.biography:
I received my BA in Professional Acting from LAMDA, before going on to train as a Location Sound Recordist at NFTS. So you can be sure both the performance and the sound will be of the highest quality.

I’m British and have a natural, clear, warm and engaging neutral accent. I am also a Dutch citizen, speak conversational Dutch and am adept at character voices and other accents, including RP (posh, traditional British), Northern, Scottish and General American.

I’ve voiced over 300 projects for clients in over 40 countries, including Unilever, Johnnie Walker, TomTom, Lime Bike, HSBC & the BBC. Projects included Documentaries, Viral Videos, Games, Adverts, Courses, Explainer Videos and Animations. I have also narrated four audiobooks, including Target Churchill by Warren Adler (War of the Roses). I’m a narrator for both Findaway Voices & USound.
details.name: Nick Howden-Steenstra
